question.fr: Combien vaut l'expression logique not(1 or 0) and (1 or 0) ?
question.eng: What is the value of the logical expression not(1 or 0) and (1 or 0)?

question.fr:
Combien vaut la variable i à la fin de ce programme ?
i=16
while i>=3:
    print(i)
    i=i-1
question.eng:
What is the value of the variable i at the end of this program?
i=16
while i>=3:
    print(i)
    i=i-1

question.fr:
Combien vaut la liste b à la fin de ce programme ?
a=['R', 'O']
b=[]
for c in a:
    b.append(chr(ord(c)+1))
question.eng:
What is the value of the list b at the end of this program?
a=['R', 'O']
b=[]
for c in a:
    b.append(chr(ord(c)+1))

question.fr:
Combien vaudra la variable b à la fin de ce programme ?
a=2
b=6
c=7
d=2
for i in [8, 44, 47, 16, 40, 52, 21, 79]:
    a=b
    b=c
    c=d
    d=i
question.eng:
What will be the value of the variable b at the end of this program?
a=2
b=6
c=7
d=2
for i in [8, 44, 47, 16, 40, 52, 21, 79]:
    a=b
    b=c
    c=d
    d=i

question.fr:
Combien vaut la variable c à la fin de ce programme ?
a=tuple([51, 17, 53, 85, 25, 26])
b=tuple([96, 19, 73, 42])
c=a==b
question.eng:
What is the value of the variable c at the end of this program?
a=tuple([51, 17, 53, 85, 25, 26])
b=tuple([96, 19, 73, 42])
c=a==b
